data.actual_result: The emoji is used for a few seconds and then quickly disappears without a warning message.
data.expected_result: There would be message telling you that you cannot react with external emojis.
data.short_description: When trying to react to a message when you don't have the use external emojis permission will try to use the emote but instantly delete it without a warning.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server/channel where you do not have the External emojis permission but have the reaction permission. - Try to use a super cool external emoji as a reaction to a message.
